message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'd like to save a bit more if possible.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $137?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, which would be $136.50. Could you consider that?
